SELECT board_no AS boardNo ,board_title AS boardTitle ,board_content AS boardContent ,staff_name AS staffName ,board_wrt_date AS boardWrtDate ,board_modi_date AS boardModiDate ,board_view_cnt AS boardViewCnt FROM board INNER JOIN staff ON board.staff_id = staff.staff_code WHERE board_no = #{no}
